label: AB4C_hP72_184_d_4d_d-001
title: Al[PO$_{4}$] (Framework type AFI) Structure
comments:
Klap refers calls this AlPO$_{4}$-5. 
 Space group $P6cc$ \#186 allows an arbitary origin of the $z$-axis.  Here we set $z_{1} = 0$ for the Al (12d) site. 
 Polytypes of this compound also appear in space groups \href{current_web_home_dir/AB4C_hP72_168_2d_8d_2d-001}{$P6$ \#168 (AB4C\_hP72\_168\_2d\_8d\_2d)} and \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2_hP72_192_m_j2kl-001}{$P6/mcc$ \#192 (AB2\_hP72\_192\_m\_j2kl)}.
